titleStmt.title: Advertisement. At the Hand and Pen near the King's Bagnio in Long-Acre, liveth Mrs. Isabella Inglish, who alone is authorised by their Majesties to make and publish Dr. Anderson's Grana Angelica, or the famous true Scots Pills ...
titleStmt.author: Inglish, Isabella.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
